name: Root of the Problem (goatfrog)
description:
Join Merle, the recently qualified therapist, on an average day of helping his clients. Gather keywords, press for information, question the client and match keywords to find the Root of the Problem.

A game made for the Global Games Jam 2023. The theme was "Roots". 

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/root-problem-9-1?fbclid=IwAR3imNXH_5FMcHzlh...

Tech - Justin Beasley

 Design/Narrative - Aaron Colledge 

Art- Becky Farr 

Assets Used 

Music

-https://freesound.org/people/holizna/sounds/629147/

-https://freesound.org/people/joshuaempyre/sounds/250750/
